timeline.message:
[WFLY-13650] Allow expressions for ordinal attribute

* Bump management model to 1.1.0
* Add tranformers to reject expressions

* remove overriden requiresRuntime methods from ConfigSourceDefinition
  and ConfigSourceProviderDefinition to use the default semantics.

JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13650

Signed-off-by: Jeff Mesnil <jmesnil@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: Why minor? We have been doing a major bump for major WildFly versions.
timeline.author: rhusar

replies.bodyText:
I thought about this and I'm not sure that change requires a major bump. I'm not modifying the management model in a significant way: there is only 1 flag changed on a single attribute.
I thinks this bug fix fits a minor version bump but if we have required a major bump no matter the changes, I can amend my PR.
replies.author: jmesnil

replies.bodyText:
The basic reasons we do major version bumps is:

To ensure we always have space for new API versions downstream, in whatever downstream variants we may care about.
KISS principle.

You have a really strong sense of possible downstream needs so I'm happy to defer to your judgement.
replies.author: bstansberry

replies.bodyText: I'm fine with keeping a minor bump for that single change... If there were any other changes done to this subsystem before WildFLy 21 is released, then I'll make major bump at that time
replies.author: jmesnil
